If your download is OK and you have WinRAR installed it should not matter with file you Click because WinRAR cant take care of file index for you. You can right click and choose "extract to..." or you can run WinRAR and extract from there.

Updated :
If your download is OK and you have WinRAR installed it should not matter with file you Click because WinRAR CAN take care of file index for you. You can right click and choose "extract to..." or you can run WinRAR and extract from there
If cant extract, you must have corrupted files.
Use WinRAR's test feature to check files.
